About

%expExcel

February 25, 2009

i’ve uploaded the expExcel macro to the downloads section of the sas-quatch project github repository. pretty straight forward utility macro. this is a streamlined version that should work on any SAS client with the sas/access to pc files module. at work, that module is only installed on the server, so there is a bit of client-server code that i cut out. if people want to see the client-server version, i can upload that as well.

%expExcel - February 25, 2009 -
